02. Projects

MedMinder

Have you ever been focused so intently on your latest development project that you forgot to take your medication? What about when it's 10 pm and you forgot to get your script filled? Well never again! With MedMinder at your side this becomes a problem of the past, simply schedule a reminder and never worry about missing meds again.
